meanings.definition: A group of four people playing music or singing together.
meanings.sent1: The school quartet performed at the talent show.
meanings.sent2: The quartet sang beautifully at the concert.
meanings.sent3: The quartet's music was so catchy, it got stuck in my head all day.
meanings.sent4: The quartet's harmonies blended together like colors on a painting.
meanings.sent5: I will never forget the quartet's mesmerizing performance.

meanings.definition: A group of four instruments or voices performing together.
meanings.sent1: The string quartet played a classical piece with precision.
meanings.sent2: The quartet of trumpets added a festive touch to the parade.
meanings.sent3: The quartet of saxophones sounded like a group of chatty geese.
meanings.sent4: The quartet of guitars strummed in perfect harmony.
meanings.sent5: The quartet of violins filled the room with enchanting melodies.
